DOC.brief_summary: The APD791-001 study is designed primarily to evaluate the safety and tolerability of APD791 when administered as a single oral dose to healthy adult subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Single-Dose Safety Study of APD791 in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult men and women, ages 1945 Non smokers History of a bleeding disorder Recently donated blood or had significant blood loss Current use of a prescription medication Pregnant females
